summary: Adds a very creepy new player home close to Shor's Stone, perfect for darker characters.
descriptionHtml:
[img] http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/26297-1-1351724674.jpg [/img]

***UPDATE*** Yopoman Compendium featuring updated Yuggoth, Forbidden Wel, Swindler's Lookout and TONS of other small mods, changes, tweaks, updates, gameplay alterations, alchemy additions, etc... is available at the following link as an installer that points to the main Skyrim directory, activate/deactivate the mods as you please as they are modular and not dependent upon each other: http://www.satapop.com/yopoman_compendium_09_15_2013.exe

-This mod adds a player home very close to Shor's Stone. The new home is an extremely creepy crypt with its own cemetery, item storage, bed and a unique weapon.

-Forbidden Well should be compatible with all mods.

-Please do not re-upload my mod to any other site, for now it is Nexus only! Thank you.

---UPDATES---

1.2: -Adds new herbarium room.
-Cosmetic changes.
-Minor bug fixes.

1.1: -Adds magic function to shrine.
-Adds weapon racks in main room.
-Adds cage in main room.
-Cosmetic changes.
-Minor bug fixes.

Installation: 1. Go to your Skyrim installation directory (usually C:Program Files (x86)Steamsteamappscommonskyrim).
2. Open the "Data" directory.
3. Copy the included "Yopoman_Forbidden_Well.esp" file into your "Data" directory.
4. Run Skyrim, make sure to click on "Data Files" from the Skyrim launcher and check the box next to "Yopoman_Forbidden_Well".
5. Play the game.

Uninstallation: 1. Delete the Yopoman_Forbidden_Well.esp file you installed earlier.

Be sure to check out my other mods here on Skyrim Nexus!

Swindler's Lookout
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26141

Yuggoth
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25637
author: Yopoman
